verses.verse: It happened in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> in the fifth <S%H2549><s%> month, <S%H6218><s%> the tenth day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> that certain <S%H582><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to inquire <S%H1875><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and sat <S%H3427><s%> before me. <S%H6440><s%>
The word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> to the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> them, <S%H559><s%> Thus says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H136><s%> Is it to inquire <S%H1875><s%> of me that you have come? <S%H935><s%> As I live, <S%H2416><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3069><s%> I will not be inquired of by you. <S%H1875><s%>

Will you judge <S%H8199><s%> them, <S%H1121><s%> son of man, <S%H120><s%> will you judge <S%H8199><s%> them? <S%H3045><s%> Cause them to know the abominations <S%H8441><s%> of their fathers; <S%H1><s%>

and tell <S%H559><s%> them, <S%H559><s%> Thus says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> In the day <S%H3117><s%> when I chose <S%H977><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and swore <S%H3027><s%> to <S%H5375><s%> the seed <S%H2233><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and made myself known <S%H3045><s%> to them in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> when I swore <S%H3027><s%> to <S%H5375><s%> them, <S%H559><s%> saying, I am Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%>

in that day <S%H3117><s%> I swore <S%H3027><s%> to <S%H5375><s%> them, <S%H3318><s%> to bring them forth out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> into a land <S%H776><s%> that I had searched <S%H8446><s%> out for them, <S%H2100><s%> flowing with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey, <S%H1706><s%> which is the glory <S%H6643><s%> of all lands. <S%H776><s%>

I said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H7993><s%> Cast away every man <S%H376><s%> the abominations <S%H8251><s%> of his eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and don't <S%H2930><s%> defile yourselves with the idols <S%H1544><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> I am Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

But they rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against me, <S%H14><s%> and would not listen <S%H8085><s%> to me; <S%H376><s%> they each didn't <S%H7993><s%> throw away the abominations <S%H8251><s%> of their eyes, <S%H5869><s%> neither did they forsake <S%H5800><s%> the idols <S%H1544><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%> Then I said <S%H559><s%> I would pour out <S%H8210><s%> my wrath <S%H2534><s%> on them, <S%H3615><s%> to accomplish my anger <S%H639><s%> against them in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

But I worked <S%H6213><s%> for my name <S%H8034><s%>'s sake, <S%H2490><s%> that it should not be profaned in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> which they were, <S%H5869><s%> in whose sight I made myself known <S%H3045><s%> to them, <S%H3318><s%> in bringing them forth out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>
So I caused them to go forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> them into the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>
I gave <S%H5414><s%> them my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and showed <S%H3045><s%> them my ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> which if a man <S%H120><s%> does, <S%H6213><s%> he shall live in them. <S%H2425><s%>

Moreover also I gave <S%H5414><s%> them my Sabbaths, <S%H7676><s%> to be a sign <S%H226><s%> between me and them, <S%H3045><s%> that they might know that I am Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> who sanctifies them. <S%H6942><s%>

But the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against me in the wilderness: <S%H4057><s%> they didn't <S%H1980><s%> walk in my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and they rejected <S%H3988><s%> my ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> which if a man <S%H120><s%> keep, <S%H6213><s%> he shall live <S%H2425><s%> in them; <S%H7676><s%> and my Sabbaths they greatly <S%H3966><s%> profaned. <S%H2490><s%> Then I said <S%H559><s%> I would pour out <S%H8210><s%> my wrath <S%H2534><s%> on them in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> to consume them. <S%H3615><s%>

But I worked <S%H6213><s%> for my name <S%H8034><s%>'s sake, <S%H2490><s%> that it should not be profaned in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> in whose sight <S%H5869><s%> I brought them out. <S%H3318><s%>

Moreover also I swore <S%H3027><s%> to <S%H5375><s%> them in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> that I would not bring <S%H935><s%> them into the land <S%H776><s%> which I had given <S%H5414><s%> them, <S%H2100><s%> flowing with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey, <S%H1706><s%> which is the glory <S%H6643><s%> of all lands; <S%H776><s%>

because they rejected <S%H3988><s%> my ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> and didn't <S%H1980><s%> walk in my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and profaned <S%H2490><s%> my Sabbaths: <S%H7676><s%> for their heart <S%H3820><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their idols. <S%H1544><s%>

Nevertheless my eye <S%H5869><s%> spared <S%H2347><s%> them, <S%H7843><s%> and I didn't destroy them, <S%H6213><s%> neither did I make a full end <S%H3617><s%> of them in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

I said <S%H559><s%> to their children <S%H1121><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> Don't <S%H3212><s%> walk in the statutes <S%H2706><s%> of your fathers, <S%H1><s%> neither observe <S%H8104><s%> their ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> nor defile <S%H2930><s%> yourselves with their idols. <S%H1544><s%>
I am Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God: <S%H430><s%> walk <S%H3212><s%> in my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> my ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> and do them; <S%H6213><s%>
and make my Sabbaths <S%H7676><s%> holy; <S%H6942><s%> and they shall be a sign <S%H226><s%> between me and you, <S%H3045><s%> that you may know that I am Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

But the children <S%H1121><s%> rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against me; <S%H1980><s%> they didn't walk in my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> neither kept <S%H8104><s%> my ordinances <S%H4941><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> them, <S%H120><s%> which if a man do, <S%H6213><s%> he shall live <S%H2425><s%> in them; <S%H2490><s%> they profaned my Sabbaths. <S%H7676><s%> Then I said <S%H559><s%> I would pour out <S%H8210><s%> my wrath <S%H2534><s%> on them, <S%H3615><s%> to accomplish my anger <S%H639><s%> against them in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

Nevertheless I withdrew <S%H7725><s%> my hand, <S%H3027><s%> and worked <S%H6213><s%> for my name <S%H8034><s%>'s sake, <S%H2490><s%> that it should not be profaned in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> in whose sight <S%H5869><s%> I brought them forth. <S%H3318><s%>

Moreover I swore <S%H3027><s%> to <S%H5375><s%> them in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> that I would scatter <S%H6327><s%> them among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and disperse <S%H2219><s%> them through the countries; <S%H776><s%>

because they had not executed <S%H6213><s%> my ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> but had rejected <S%H3988><s%> my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and had profaned <S%H2490><s%> my Sabbaths, <S%H7676><s%> and their eyes <S%H5869><s%> were after <S%H310><s%> their fathers <S%H1><s%>' idols. <S%H1544><s%>
Moreover also I gave <S%H5414><s%> them statutes <S%H2706><s%> that were not good, <S%H2896><s%> and ordinances <S%H4941><s%> in which they should not live; <S%H2421><s%>

and I polluted <S%H2930><s%> them in their own gifts, <S%H4979><s%> in that they caused to pass through <S%H5674><s%> the fire all that opens <S%H6363><s%> the womb, <S%H7356><s%> that I might make them desolate, <S%H8074><s%> to the end that they might know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Therefore, <S%H1121><s%> son of man, <S%H120><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> them, <S%H559><s%> Thus says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> In this moreover have your fathers <S%H1><s%> blasphemed <S%H1442><s%> me, <S%H4603><s%> in that they have committed a trespass against me. <S%H4604><s%>

For when I had brought <S%H935><s%> them into the land, <S%H776><s%> which I swore <S%H3027><s%> to <S%H5375><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> to them, <S%H7200><s%> then they saw every high <S%H7311><s%> hill, <S%H1389><s%> and every thick <S%H5687><s%> tree, <S%H6086><s%> and they offered <S%H2076><s%> there their sacrifices, <S%H2077><s%> and there they presented <S%H5414><s%> the provocation <S%H3708><s%> of their offering; <S%H2076><s%> there also they made <S%H7760><s%> their pleasant <S%H5207><s%> aroma, <S%H7381><s%> and they poured out <S%H5258><s%> there their drink offerings. <S%H5262><s%>

Then I said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H1116><s%> What does the high place where you go <S%H935><s%> mean? <S%H8034><s%> So its name is called <S%H7121><s%> Bamah <S%H1117><s%> to this day. <S%H3117><s%>

Therefore tell <S%H559><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H136><s%> Do you pollute <S%H2930><s%> yourselves in the way <S%H1870><s%> of your fathers? <S%H1><s%> and do you play the prostitute <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their abominations? <S%H8251><s%>

and when you offer <S%H5375><s%> your gifts, <S%H4979><s%> when you make your sons <S%H1121><s%> to pass through <S%H5674><s%> the fire, <S%H784><s%> do you pollute <S%H2930><s%> yourselves with all your idols <S%H1544><s%> to this day? <S%H3117><s%> and shall I be inquired <S%H1875><s%> of by you, <S%H1004><s%> house of Israel? <S%H3478><s%> As I live, <S%H2416><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3069><s%> I will not be inquired of by you; <S%H1875><s%>

and that which comes <S%H5927><s%> into your mind <S%H7307><s%> shall not be at all, <S%H559><s%> in that you say, We will be <S%H1961><s%> as the nations, <S%H1471><s%> as the families <S%H4940><s%> of the countries, <S%H776><s%> to serve <S%H8334><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> and stone. <S%H68><s%>

As I live, <S%H2416><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3069><s%> surely with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and with an outstretched <S%H5186><s%> arm, <S%H2220><s%> and with wrath <S%H2534><s%> poured out, <S%H5186><s%> will I be king over you: <S%H4427><s%>

and I will bring you out <S%H3318><s%> from the peoples, <S%H5971><s%> and will gather <S%H6908><s%> you out of the countries <S%H776><s%> in which you are scattered, <S%H6327><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and with an outstretched <S%H5186><s%> arm, <S%H2220><s%> and with wrath <S%H2534><s%> poured out; <S%H8210><s%>
and I will bring <S%H935><s%> you into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of the peoples, <S%H5971><s%> and there will I enter into judgment <S%H8199><s%> with you face <S%H6440><s%> to face. <S%H6440><s%>

Like as I entered into judgment <S%H8199><s%> with your fathers <S%H1><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> so will I enter into judgment <S%H8199><s%> with you, <S%H5002><s%> says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3069><s%>
I will cause you to pass <S%H5674><s%> under the rod, <S%H7626><s%> and I will bring <S%H935><s%> you into the bond <S%H4562><s%> of the covenant; <S%H1285><s%>

and I will purge out <S%H1305><s%> from among you the rebels, <S%H4775><s%> and those who disobey <S%H6586><s%> against me; <S%H3318><s%> I will bring them forth out of the land <S%H776><s%> where they live, <S%H4033><s%> but they shall not enter <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

As for you, <S%H1004><s%> house of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> Go, <S%H3212><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> everyone <S%H376><s%> his idols, <S%H1544><s%> and hereafter <S%H310><s%> also, <S%H8085><s%> if you will not listen to me; <S%H6944><s%> but my holy name <S%H8034><s%> you shall no more profane <S%H2490><s%> with your gifts, <S%H4979><s%> and with your idols. <S%H1544><s%>

For in my holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain, <S%H2022><s%> in the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of the height <S%H4791><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3069><s%> there shall all the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> all of them, <S%H5647><s%> serve me in the land: <S%H776><s%> there will I accept <S%H7521><s%> them, <S%H1875><s%> and there will I require your offerings, <S%H8641><s%> and the first fruits <S%H7225><s%> of your offerings, <S%H4864><s%> with all your holy things. <S%H6944><s%>

As a pleasant <S%H5207><s%> aroma <S%H7381><s%> will I accept <S%H7521><s%> you, <S%H3318><s%> when I bring you out from the peoples, <S%H5971><s%> and gather <S%H6908><s%> you out <S%H3318><s%> of the countries <S%H776><s%> in which you have been scattered; <S%H6327><s%> and I will be sanctified <S%H6942><s%> in you in the sight of the nations. <S%H1471><s%>

You shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> when I shall bring <S%H935><s%> you into the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> into the country <S%H776><s%> which I swore <S%H3027><s%> to <S%H5375><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> to your fathers. <S%H1><s%>

There you shall remember <S%H2142><s%> your ways, <S%H1870><s%> and all your doings, <S%H5949><s%> in which you have polluted <S%H2930><s%> yourselves; <S%H6962><s%> and you shall loathe yourselves in your own sight <S%H6440><s%> for all your evils <S%H7451><s%> that you have committed. <S%H6213><s%>

You shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> when I have dealt <S%H6213><s%> with you for my name <S%H8034><s%>'s sake, <S%H7451><s%> not according to your evil ways, <S%H1870><s%> nor according to your corrupt <S%H7843><s%> doings, <S%H5949><s%> you house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3069><s%>
The word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> the south, <S%H8486><s%> and drop <S%H5197><s%> your word toward the south, <S%H1864><s%> and prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against the forest <S%H3293><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> in the South; <S%H5045><s%>

and tell <S%H559><s%> the forest <S%H3293><s%> of the South, <S%H5045><s%> Hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> Behold, <S%H3341><s%> I will kindle a fire <S%H784><s%> in you, <S%H398><s%> and it shall devour every green <S%H3892><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> in you, <S%H3002><s%> and every dry tree: <S%H6086><s%> the flaming <S%H3852><s%> flame <S%H7957><s%> shall not be quenched, <S%H3518><s%> and all faces <S%H6440><s%> from the south <S%H5045><s%> to the north <S%H6828><s%> shall be burnt thereby. <S%H6866><s%>
All flesh <S%H1320><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> that I, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, have kindled <S%H1197><s%> it; <S%H3518><s%> it shall not be quenched.
Then I said, <S%H559><s%> Ah <S%H162><s%> Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh! <S%H136><s%> they say <S%H559><s%> of me, <S%H4911><s%> Isn't he a speaker of parables? <S%H4912><s%>
